item.title: How Tiny Drones Inspired by Bats Could Save Lives in Dark and Stormy Conditions
item.description: Students at Worcester Polytechnic Institute are designing small drones that use ultrasonic sensors.

item.title: This One Brilliant Investment Would Have Made Bezos a Billionaire Without Amazon
The ‘Cheating App’ Founder Explains How to Rage Bait Your Startup to Success
item.description: Cluey reached a more than $100M valuation after an investment by Andreessen Horowitz.

item.title: Pfizer Sues to Stop Rival Bid for Drugmaker Metsera by Denmark’s Novo Nordisk
item.description: Metsera currently has no products on the market, but is developing oral and injectable treatments for obesity and diabetes.

item.title: Berkshire Cash Sets Record as Profit Rises, Signaling Caution Ahead of Buffett Exit
item.description: Vice Chairman Greg Abel will succeed the legendary investor, though Buffett will remain chairman.
